name: Ångström Interactive
description:
This is a dump of the Angstrom Interactive Private Beta Client iso from late 2003. My dad worked for them until they folded in 2004. He never talked about his work, but it was deep cyber-tech stuff. I found a backup of their old company software and figured I'd post it.
There's some weird stuff in here, definitely worth a look.

EDIT: woaaaaaaah...
okay so it looks like the client actually connects to the angstrom network??
who's paying for the server???
